summary.span: 为 .NET Framework 元素创建主题特定外观。

span.span: Creates the theme-specific look for .NET Framework elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实际外观依赖于用户的系统上的活动的主题。The actual appearance of the is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system. 此类的属性允许.NET Framework 来设置基于当前主题的外观。The properties of this class allow the .NET Framework to set the appearance based on the current theme. 在 XAML 用法中，对象元素还可以有子内容，它可以是单个设置属性。In XAML usage, a object element can also have child content, which can be a single that sets the property. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:` 为 xmlns 前缀CLR 命名空间。An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 通常情况下，xmlns 前缀和映射 （未显示） 的 XAML 根元素中定义。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否具有窗体上默认按钮的外观。

value.span: 如果 具有默认按钮的外观，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has the appearance of the default button; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认按钮通常具有较深的外边框或其他可视的指示器用于显示用户将单击的按钮，如果按 Enter 键。The default button generally has a darker outer border or other visual indicator that shows the user which button will be clicked if the Enter key is pressed. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`| （但是，可能未设置此属性是在所有的主题） (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|
